#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<map>
#include<algorithm>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
#include<cstring>
#include<cmath>

#define max(a,b) (a>b?a:b)
#define min(a,b) (a<b?a:b)
#define ll long long int
#define mp make_pair()
#define PII pair<ll,int>
#define s(a) scanf("%d",&a)
#define pb(a) push_back(a)
#define llu unsigned long long
#define ppb() pop_back()
#define mod 1000000007

using namespace std;
int main()
{
int t;
s(t);

while(t--)
{
string str;
cin>>str;

int l=str.length();

if(l==1&&str[0]=='4')
printf("7\n");
if(l==1&&str[0]=='7')
printf("44\n");

bool flag=true;
//cdtn check
if(l!=1)
{

for(int i=1;i<l;i++)
{
if(str[i]==str[0])
continue;
else
{flag=false;break;}}

if(flag&&str[l-1]=='4')
{
str[l-1]='7';
cout<<str<<endl;
}

else if(flag&&str[l-1]=='7')
{
for(int i=0;i<l;i++)
str[i]='4';

str=str+'4';
cout<<str<<endl;
}

else
{
if(str[l-1]=='4')
{
str[l-1]='7';
cout<<str<<endl;
}
else if(str[l-1]=='7')
{
  for(int i=l-1;i>=0;i--)
  {if(str[i]=='7')
  {str[i]='4';continue;}
  if(str[i]=='4')
  {str[i]='7';
  break;
  }
  }
  cout<<str<<endl;
  }
  }
}
}
  return 0;
  }
